text: Centreville was a city in Illinois in the United States. It is in St. Clair County. In 2021, it became part of the new city of Cahokia Heights, Illinois. == Notable people == * Edward Burch, alternative country musician * John Dettmer, pitcher for the Texas Rangers * Byron Gettis, outfielder for the Kansas City Royals * Reginald Hudlin, film director ==References== Category:Cities in Illinois
title: Centreville, Illinois
